```{r load-packages, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
owid_co2_data <- read_csv("owid-co2-data.csv")
```

```{r}
owid_co2_data %>%
          group_by(country) %>%
          filter(year > "1949") %>%
     select( country)
```

```{r}
owid_co2_data %>%
  mutate(example_countries <- "United Sates, China")
```
```{r}
     ggplot(owid_co2_data, aes(x= year, y=co2, color=country)) +
     geom_line() +
       xlim(1950, 2021)
```
```{r}
Our_co2_dataset <- owid_co2_data %>%
   select("country", "year", "population", "co2", "co2_per_capita")
```
```{r}
glimpse(Our_co2_dataset)
```
